fun_preparePlot()

  obj[,c(1,which(regexpr(':',gsub(':実数','',colnames(obj))) != -1))]

  fun_transposeDataFrame(obj = dataSet,tailN = 1,dateFormat = dateFormat)

  buf[order(buf[,2],decreasing = T),]

  obj[,c(1,grep(paste0(gsub('\\(.+\\)','',head(latestDF[,1],2)),collapse = '|'),colnames(obj)))]

                   typeL = 'o',typeR = 'o',
                   dateFormat = dateFormat,
                   chartType = 1,dataTitle = '事業活動の産業(中分類)別売上高',
                   dataSource = dataSource,
                   fitLcolor = 1,fitlwdL = 3,cexL = 1.5,
                   fitRcolor = 2,fitlwdR = 3,cexR = 1.5,
                   mar = c(5,4,6,2),needLefLab = 0)

abline(h = 0,col = 'red',lwd = 2)
dev.off()
